# Doubt (Drawback)
## Overview
**Doubt:** You lack confidence in your abilities or confidence in the universe at large. Whenever you fail a skill or ability check, you take a â€”4 penalty on that type of skill or ability check for the next hour.

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 65
